column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Bavette's cooks that beef the best of any steakhouse in the USA. Hence
column2: my favorite restaurant of all time. The Burrata cheese is done with impeccable technique
column3: their cocktails are such american classics
column4: the carrot cake is also amazing. The bacon is truly special
column5: I have no idea where they source it from or how they cook it
column6: but no one has anything like it. I have brought friends
column8: and colleagues here on several occasions
column9: its such an incredible dining experience. I live in Denver now
column10: but I cannot wait to take my husband here when we come to Chicago for a wedding next month.
